function.name: send_mavlink_command_int
function.description: Send a mavlink COMMAND_INT message to the vehicle.  Available commands including changing the flight mode, arming, disarming, takeoff and commanding the vehicle to fly to a specific location

frame.description: altitude type.  see MAV_FRAME.  0 for altitude above sea level, 3 for altitude above home, 10 for altitude above terrain

command.description: MAVLink command id.  See MAV_CMD for a full list of available commands

z.description: altitude in meters (relative to sea level, home or terrain depending on frame field).
